text: Great work on the initial mockups! The color scheme looks modern.
Thanks! I'll incorporate the feedback and update the design.
Navigation structure is complete, working on mobile responsiveness now.
Architecture design is complete. Starting implementation phase.
Strategy document is complete and ready for review.
Email templates are ready and tested across different clients.
Venue is booked, working on speaker lineup and catering.
Authentication flow is implemented, working on security features.
